creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art and Culture
description: a group of men warm themselves by a blazing fire sending a tall pillar of smoke into the air; another person, wearing a yellow cloak, smokes a pipe at R; woman with baby on back carries walking stick between hands; large plain with bales, rooftops, and a few scraggly trees in middle ground; castle among many rooftops in distance
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seals

LR mar URQ; ULQ
title: Hamamatsu, from the series 53 Stations of the Tokaido
